description: Use cutting-edge Flux AI technology to instantly generate high-quality images from text descriptions. Supports multiple aspect ratios and style customization.

form.promptDescription: Describe the image content you want to generate
form.promptPlaceholder: e.g., A beautiful landscape painting with morning mist, ink wash style
form.aspectRatioDescription: Choose the aspect ratio for generated images
form.outputCountDescription: Select the number of images to generate at once
